about_the_game:
The Action Pack unlocks four new categories with a total of 50 awesome new decals. The Action Pack is full of everything from signs, bullet holes, racing stripes to aircraft dashboard dials. Give your builds character by adding authentic battle damage, or technical details! The pack consists of:

Signs & Symbols:

Crosshair, Fragile Sign, Caution Hot Sign, Nuclear Sign, Smiley, Warning Sign, Warning Tape, Trailmakers Logo, Wide Load Sign, Recycle Sign, Skull and Bones, Raw Engine Sign, Bulldawg Engine Sign, Dragon Engine Sign.

Damage:

Dirt, Bullet Hole, Single Metal Rip, Multiple Metal Rip, Slime Drip, Slime Splat, Burnmark, Plasters, Single Plaster, Exposed Circuitry, Fractured Glass.

Tech:

Car Dashboard, Aircraft Dashboard, Gauge, Hexagon Bolt, Square Vent, Sideways Vent, Round Bolt, Bolted Plate, Circuit Board, Tech Plate, Circular Tech Hatch, Tech Button Panel, Broad Bladed Fan, Narrow Bladed Fan.

Racing Signs:

Flame, Dragon Shape, Sharp Racing Stripe, Triangles Racing Stripe, Bend Racing Stripe, Checkered Racing Stripe, Flag Racing Stripe, Fork Racing Stripe, Rectangles Racing Stripe, Curved Racing Stripe, Parallel Lines Racing Stripe.

Please note that decals are only cosmetic in nature, and do not alter the physical properties of blocks in the game. Players who do not own the Action Pack cannot edit vehicles that use these decals without purchasing the Action Pack for themselves, but will still be able to drive vehicles with these decals equipped if spawned in by a player who owns the Action Pack.

In addition to making your builds look amazing, buying the Action Pack also supports the continued development of Trailmakers and future games from Flashbulb Games. Thank you for supporting us!

name: Trailmakers: Decals Action Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: i5-4440 (3.1 GHz quad-core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: i7-7700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
